text.div:
Functional Status Observation: HHC OASIS Functional Status Assessment at Start of Care (SOC)

What was the patient's usual performance related to their ability to once seated in a wheelchair/scooter, wheel at least 50 feet and make two turns?

code.text: What was the patient's usual performance related to their ability to once seated in a wheelchair/scooter, wheel at least 50 feet and make two turns?
